text: ketta penkal ketta ankalukkum ketta ankal ketta penkalukkum innum, nalla tuymaiyutaiya penkal, nalla tuymaiyana ankalukkum nalla tuymaiyana ankal nalla tuymaiyana penkaluku; kum (takutiyanavarkal.) Avarkal kuruvatai vittum ivarkale tuymaiyanavarkal. Ivarkalukku mannippum, kanniyamana unavumuntu
